headline: Gilead Presents Full PURPOSE 2 Data Results for Twice-Yearly Lenacapavir for HIV Prevention at HIV Glasgow
summary: FOSTER CITY, Calif., November 13, 2024--Gilead Sciences, Inc. (Nasdaq: GILD) today presented the first in-depth look at full results from its pivotal Phase 3 PURPOSE 2 trial (NCT04925752), which is studying twice-yearly lenacapavir, the company’s injectable HIV-1 capsid inhibitor, for the investigational use of HIV prevention among a broad and geographically diverse range of cisgender men and gender-diverse people. Newly presented results include data on adherence to and pharmacokinetics of lena
